travel.summary.title: Your trip summary
travel.summary.bookTrip: Book this trip in one click
tripDetails.organizerDesc: Travliaq SAS acts as a travel organizer under EU Directive 2015/2302. As such, we are responsible for the proper execution of all services included in your package.
tripDetails.globalResponsibilityDesc: In case of problems with a provider (hotel, airline, etc.), you contact Travliaq directly. We handle complaints and coordinate with all partners.
tripDetails.noRefundPolicy: No refund in case of cancellation
tripDetails.noRefundDesc: Reservations are firm and final. No refund will be made in case of cancellation, regardless of the reason or time before departure.
tripDetails.insuranceRecommendation: We strongly recommend taking out travel cancellation insurance with your insurer to protect against unforeseen events.
tripDetails.insolvencyGuaranteeDesc: In accordance with EU regulations, Travliaq has a financial guarantee that ensures reimbursement of amounts paid and repatriation of travelers in case of company failure.
tripDetails.rcProInsuranceDesc: Travliaq is covered by professional liability insurance specific to the travel sector, covering damages that may occur during the organization of your stay.
tripDetails.acceptTerms: I have read and accept the
tripDetails.acceptTerms2: as well as the information regarding responsibilities and guarantees detailed above.
tripDetails.footerNote: In accordance with EU Directive 2015/2302 on package travel, you benefit from all consumer rights provided.
